Alessia Russo sealed a remarkable comeback in stoppage-time as Manchester United stunned Arsenal 3-2 to inflict a first defeat of the season on the WSL leaders.

articles.title: ‘Anti-football’ – Charlton boss criticises Port Vale after defeat at Vale Park - Stoke-on-Trent Live
articles.description: Port Vale beat Charlton 1-0 at Vale Park in League One
articles.content:
Charlton manager Ben Garner said Port Vale played anti-football to beat his side 1-0 in Burslem this afternoon.
Danny Butterworths 57th-minute goal separated the teams as Vale leapfrogged Garners si… [+2252 chars]

articles.title: Plymouth Argyle manager Steven Schumacher fumes over Burton Albion equaliser - Plymouth Live
articles.description: Burton made it 2-2 in the closing seconds after a drop ball was awarded and it led to Adrian Mariappa equalising

articles.title: Australia 30-10 Samoa: Kangaroos claim third consecutive World Cup with hard-fought victory - BBC
articles.description: Australia claim a third consecutive World Cup with a hard-fought 30-10 victory over Samoa at Old Trafford.
